snippet.title: Steve Reich’s Clapping Music
snippet.description:
A new game based on Steve Reich’s iconic Clapping Music let's anyone improve their rhythm 

“In 1972 I composed a piece called Clapping Music and all it needs is your two hands. This app is very helpful: it will teach you to play the piece and it will prepare you to perform it live. It’s a bit of a challenge but an interesting one, and you can download it for nothing.” Steve Reich

Download now: https://itunes.apple.com/app/id946487211?ls=1&mt=8

Find out more about London Sinfonietta: https://londonsinfonietta.org.uk/
Sign up to our e-list: https://londonsinfonietta.org.uk/sign-up
Donate to the London Sinfonietta: https://londonsinfonietta.enthuse.com/make-a-donation#!/
